ask_passphrase: Type the [index_one], [index_two], and [index_three] letters of your chosen passphrase. Enter this on its own as one word.
Enter as a single word the [index_one], [index_two], and [index_three] letters of your stored passphrase.
passphrase_denied: Passphrase wasn't a match... please try again.
Just the [index_one], [index_two], and [index_three] letters only please.

too_many_attempts: Sorry. We cannot verify your passphrase this [time_of_day].
Too many attempts. Try again later.
exit: PASSPHRASE HAS BEEN VERIFIED. GENERATE OR CLEAR SESSION.
failed: PASSPHRASE WAS NOT VERIFIED. GENERATE OR CLEAR SESSION
